description: [Nightdoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1147) can collect information on installed applications via Windows registry keys, as well as collecting information on running processes.(Citation: ESET EvasivePanda 2024)

external_references.description: Ahn Ho, Facundo Muñoz, & Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, March 7). Evasive Panda leverages Monlam Festival to target Tibetans. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
